blog.title: Critical Role Cast Reactions
blog.description:
Feel free to submit any reactions you might have and want to share

Please ask if you can use my photos as your icon

summary: WONDERLAND HEARTS IS LOOKING FOR JESTER! Wonderland is only a place that you heard about in your dreams, in the stories. Yet...
caption:
WONDERLAND HEARTS IS LOOKING FOR JESTER!

Wonderland is only a place that you heard about in your dreams, in the stories. Yet here you are, in a world that is mad beyond belief. The land is strange, and the world likes to play tricks on your eyes, mind, and heart. But there’s a reason that you were pulled from your own world and brought here.

Do you play along with the games of this new world? Or do you go about your own style? Will you stay hopelessly lost, continuously falling down the rabbit hole? Or will you join the madness that makes Wonderland?

Wonderland Hearts is a closed multi-fandom roleplay fating group where your character is taken from their original world. Here they keep their powers, but they’re strangely altered to keep things fun, to keep a game going. Together they’ll live with other strangers and begin their new life here: the one that the Cheshire Cat plots out for you.

…ready to fall down the rabbit hole?

Home. || Premise. || Rules. || Masterlist.

blog.description: H. 22. PhD student. AT/DE/UK. Autistic and queer (they/them). Currently mostly a Critical Role blog interspersed with autism stuff, good animals, and low-key goblincore. I add image descriptions to fanart :)

summary: I wish Liam and Sam would confirm that Caleb and Nott are autistic in Talks eventually bc my autistic ass needs some validation...
question: I wish Liam and Sam would confirm that Caleb and Nott are autistic in Talks eventually bc my autistic ass needs some validation !! I love seeing Caleb do the Happy Flap Hands so much!
answer: I mean, Liam has addressed this already and has said that for Caleb he “did not set out with that express purpose, though there are certainly aspects that would lend themselves to it.” He basically said it was a headcanon, but a #valid one. Which I know isn’t quite enough in terms of representation, but what we DO have in canon is the way Nott and Caleb are played. We don’t need the creators’ permission to identify with characters who stim openly, or go nonverbal, or don’t handle change well. It means a lot to me that we get that, canon neurodivergence or not. (And yeah, Caleb doing the hand flapping? It’s just *chef’s kiss*, an utter delight, 12/10 fucking superb, please let Caleb be happy enough to do it more often, he deserves it)

reblog.comment: I mean, Liam has addressed this already and has said that for Caleb he “did not set out with that express purpose, though there are certainly aspects that would lend themselves to it.” He basically said it was a headcanon, but a #valid one. Which I know isn’t quite enough in terms of representation, but what we DO have in canon is the way Nott and Caleb are played. We don’t need the creators’ permission to identify with characters who stim openly, or go nonverbal, or don’t handle change well. It means a lot to me that we get that, canon neurodivergence or not. (And yeah, Caleb doing the hand flapping? It’s just *chef’s kiss*, an utter delight, 12/10 fucking superb, please let Caleb be happy enough to do it more often, he deserves it)

trail.content_raw: I mean, Liam has addressed this already and has said that for Caleb he “did not set out with that express purpose, though there are certainly aspects that would lend themselves to it.” He basically said it was a headcanon, but a #valid one. Which I know isn’t quite enough in terms of representation, but what we DO have in canon is the way Nott and Caleb are played. We don’t need the creators’ permission to identify with characters who stim openly, or go nonverbal, or don’t handle change well. It means a lot to me that we get that, canon neurodivergence or not. (And yeah, Caleb doing the hand flapping? It’s just *chef’s kiss*, an utter delight, 12/10 fucking superb, please let Caleb be happy enough to do it more often, he deserves it)
trail.content: I mean, Liam has addressed this already and has said that for Caleb he “did not set out with that express purpose, though there are certainly aspects that would lend themselves to it.” He basically said it was a headcanon, but a #valid one. Which I know isn’t quite enough in terms of representation, but what we DO have in canon is the way Nott and Caleb are played. We don’t need the creators’ permission to identify with characters who stim openly, or go nonverbal, or don’t handle change well. It means a lot to me that we get that, canon neurodivergence or not. (And yeah, Caleb doing the hand flapping? It’s just *chef’s kiss*, an utter delight, 12/10 fucking superb, please let Caleb be happy enough to do it more often, he deserves it)

what she says: i’m fine
what she means: lady vex’ahlia, baroness of the third house of whitestone and grand mistress of the grey...

what she says: i’m fine

what she means: lady vex’ahlia, baroness of the third house of whitestone and grand mistress of the grey hunt, has never in her life been anything but good-aligned and no power in heaven or earth or internet will for one single moment convince me otherwise

blog.name: sphinxdumpsstuff

blog.description: aka "Sketch Dump Reborn". For all the doodles, scraps, WIPs and concepts unfinished.

summary: Pub Draw ep. 2 work, feat. Mike’s face. Her features are likely to shift a change still, depending on how many more times I try...
caption:
Pub Draw ep. 2 work, feat. Mike’s face. Her features are likely to shift a change still, depending on how many more times I try to draw her, but still a better baseline to go from than 99% of other drawings so far x3 

Bit of Artamos’ horn practise there as well, while the cast were on the subject.

Also, ep 1 they did a human face but I drew a tiefling. Ep 2 they do a tiefling and I end up drawing a human (or, well, half-nauticanian). Figures I’d end up doing everything in reverse.

Coloured Face

I'm Devi and this is my blog for nerding out. Most common atm are NANA & Critical Role. And much more! 
Feel free to send me asks about anything fandom related. I enjoys prompts and questions.  My blog is mostly on queue, except for original posts, so if I seem active and not answering your ask - don't worry, I'll get to you asap.she/her

tags: but like... it really could happen lmao
summary: The best thing about having Travis and Marisha next to each other is that they both tend to repeat verbatim the rest of the...
body: The best thing about having Travis and Marisha next to each other is that they both tend to repeat verbatim the rest of the casts’ funny/badass lines right after they say them as they laugh and I’m just waiting for the day they continuously parrot the same line back at each other in a loop like those mechanical Toucan birds that repeat what you say… like Kiri but in a higher pitch voice every time they do it until it’s just a high pitched wail.

reblog.comment: The best thing about having Travis and Marisha next to each other is that they both tend to repeat verbatim the rest of the casts’ funny/badass lines right after they say them as they laugh and I’m just waiting for the day they continuously parrot the same line back at each other in a loop like those mechanical Toucan birds that repeat what you say… like Kiri but in a higher pitch voice every time they do it until it’s just a high pitched wail.

summary:
According to IMDB, Laura Bailey's trademarks are her bubbly personality and deep, sexy voice.
In Critical Role campaign 1 we get...
body:
According to IMDB, Laura Bailey’s trademarks are her bubbly personality and deep, sexy voice.

In Critical Role campaign 1 we get that Vex voice… god I swoon just thinking about it…. and in campaign 2 we get the bubbliest of personalities with Jester.

blog.name: quizzicalvole
blog.title: A Critical Role Sideblog
blog.description: Hello! Critical Role was threatening to take over my main blog (@enjoymorestuff) so now this exists. I'm caught up on Campaign 2, and I'm going through Campaign 1 for the first time. But I already know most of the Big Spoilers on account of my lack of self control.

tags: TBH my second favorite D&D bugbear NPC
But Klarrg got to recur several times on TAZ
so maybe Glousoh can show up later
summary: There’s a lot of talk about Fjord and Nott taking shots at each other during the river crossing, and that is good and right and...
body:
There’s a lot of talk about Fjord and Nott taking shots at each other during the river crossing, and that is good and right and as it should be. But all the cartoons cut off right before my favorite part.

So a moment of appreciation for when Glousoh the Bugbear says, “Do I still have to be holding this rope?” Because that is some excellent sass.

reblog.comment:

So a moment of appreciation for when Glousoh the Bugbear says, “Do I still have to be holding this rope?” Because that is some excellent sass.
